top_comments.comment: I would like to be entered into the giveaway. It’s been 20 years since I used this fragrance but when I was a teenager and into my early 20’s I wore this all the time, along with Drakkar and Cool Water

comments_since_last_sample.body: Thank you for this upload from all the Floridians...lol
I've tried a clone and have tried the OG Profumo but I don't detect any incense in the drydown. Its like a regular ADG
I would like to enter the give away, I've smelled clons of the ADG but not ADG itself, but I'm sure the real OG is something else.
I've never had the opportunity to rock Aqua De Gia sadly. Nor any Armani for that matter 😭
I would love to enter the giveaway, my brother rocks Perry Ellis 360 red and I absolutely love it, but I have never tried ADG. Thank you Ash for the opportunity.
I have never rocked ADG have only smelled it before
I would like to enter the give away, I've smelled clons of the ADG but not ADG itself, but I'm sure the real OG is something else.
Would like to enter the giveaway. That was my signature scent until my dad made it his cool father/son bonding 👍 so it holds a special place in my ❤
Never answered ADG in my life and would love to.
I would love to enter the giveaway, my brother rocks Perry Ellis 360 red and I absolutely love it, but I have never tried ADG. Thank you Ash for the opportunity.
For me it’s Cool Water. I think it’s actually better in cool weather than warm.
I would like to enter the give away, I've smelled clons of the ADG, but I'm sure the real OG is something else.
I would love to win ADG. THANKS! I’ve never worn it…yet.
ADG reminds of my younger days. It would be awesome to win to bring back memories. Thanks Ash

I would like to be entered into the giveaway. It’s been 20 years since I used this fragrance but when I was a teenager and into my early 20’s I wore this all the time, along with Drakkar and Cool Water
I would like to enter the give away, I've smelled clons of the ADG, but I'm sure the real OG is something else.
I smelled ADG last week in Sephora with my gf and she loves it. It would be nice to win this 50ml bottle
I use to wear ADG when I use to steal sprays from my dad. I'd love to get a bottle of my own :)
I’ve never actually tried the original AdG, but I would absolutely love to

I had before a sample of Agua di Gio and I like it, but I felt was fresher for mostly summer and kinda known DNA, so I tried Agua di Gio Profumo and I like it more, so I bought it because I feel is deeper and maybe used for more special occasions.
